For some time I have been looking on the internet for a decent Rui Veloso discography, whithout much success. Listening to an old LP of the album "Rui Veloso", recorded on 1986 inspired me and I decided I really had to join all the albums on a single torrent file an share it with those who love the songs from this great man of the Portuguese music: Rui Veloso.
The albums in this torrent are the following:
[1980] Rui Veloso - Ar de Rock
[1982] Rui Veloso - Fora de Moda
[1983] Rui Veloso - Guardador de Margens
[1986] Rui Veloso - Rui Veloso
[1988] Rui Veloso - Ao Vivo
[1990] Rui Veloso - Mingos & Os Samurais
[1991] Rui Veloso - Auto da Pimenta
[1995] Rui Veloso - Lado Lunar
[1998] Rui Veloso - Avenidas
[2000] VA - Tributo Rui Veloso
[2003] Rui Veloso - 20 Anos Depois
